english.segment1: Don't go away. And leave me here alone. I wish there was something I could say
english.segment2: To make you turn around. And come back home. Why can't you stay, why can't you
english.segment3: I can't stay awake. 'Cause you know I'm thinking, always thinking of you. I can't fall asleep. 'Cause you know I'm dreaming, always dreaming of you
english.segment4: Give me one more day. So you don't ruin my year. There has to be something I could say
english.segment5: To make you realize. I need you here. Why can't you stay, why can't you
english.segment6: I can't stay awake. 'Cause you know I'm thinking, always thinking of you. I can't fall asleep. 'Cause you know I'm dreaming, always dreaming of you
english.segment7: I can't stay awake. 'Cause you know I'm thinking, always thinking. I can't fall asleep. 'Cause you know I'm dreaming, always dreaming of you
english.segment8: I can't stay awake. 'Cause you know I'm thinking, always thinking of you. I can't fall asleep. 'Cause you know I'm dreaming, always dreaming of you
english.segment9: I can't stay awake. 'Cause you know I'm thinking, always thinking of you. I can't fall asleep. 'Cause you know I'm dreaming, always dreaming of you. of you..
